EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.South Customer Reception Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Appreciation Night at SpringOne Platform | Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you on Tuesday, September 25th for the Customer Appreciation Night hosted by Pivotal during SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> in Washington D.C.
Date: Tuesday, September 25, 2018
Time:
7:00PM to 9:00PM
Location: The Walrus Oyster & Ale House Oxon Hill, DC 20745 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/The+Walrus+Oyster+%26+Ale+House/@38.7844607,-77.0162523,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x974921b0488af9ec?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjTr76IhYHdAhVPrVkKHVbqDFoQ_BIwCnoECAoQCw]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team Event Details <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/South-East-Customer-Appreciation-S1P-2018.html]]>
